channel.title: Jar client help please
channel.description:
first off al i'd like to say i think this is the correct section if not plz dont ban me i new and im 2 coo to be banded please dont bann me for being 2 kewl to be bannded
ok here is my problem. ive played quiet a few servers and some of them have client with just the option to run it and play like 2 speced and crisisx i would really like to know how to do it. ive used a few tutorials but i dont get it so if you do can you please break it down please and thank you :)
